title: matrixpt
author: matrixpt
content: Hello! I have 5 avalon psu3300-01 and in all of them, the chassi led blink 2 times green light and then red solid, and the led in control board is green.The 12v from the Miner control cable harness is okI have shorted beetween AGND and SETUP and during the turn on using the switch of the power supply, it delivers 13.5v but that goes out when red light appears.Can someone help?Already replaced with new fans and no solution.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: Quote from: matrixpt on November 07, 2023, 11:37:10 PMHello! I have 5 avalon psu3300-01 and in all of them, the chassi led blink 2 times green light and then red solid, and the led in control board is green.The 12v from the Miner control cable harness is okI have shorted beetween AGND and SETUP and during the turn on using the switch of the power supply, it delivers 13.5v but that goes out when red light appears.Can someone help?Already replaced with new fans and no solution.okay take 1 of them. put it a case with no hash boards.just the controller and the fans.see if the psu works. if it works your issue may be shorts in hash boards.so go to the working model add 1 hash board and see what happens.I assume you know you have to feed 208-245 volts to the psu.get back to us after you do the controller only test.get back to us after you do the 1 hash board test.

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: If it shows red light then there is a problem with your PSU.If the suggestion above does not work or the PSU isn't able to power the unit because it suddenly turns the light red there is a possibility that the PSU is shorted or might have a few burnt parts.I suggest disassemble the unit and check the board visually and look for obvious brunt parts. If you found one you need to replace it.
